BR_text.BRsummary: Cannot display records inside a symbolic link to a directory
BR_text.BRdescription:
If the file tree is as follows, only the ordinary directory shows on the webpage.
 <denchmark-code>logs/
 |---- ordinary directory/
 |     |---- vdlrecords
 |---- symlink to a directory@
       |---- vdlrecords
 </denchmark-code>

comments_0.comment_text: You can use visualdl --logdir . in PATH:XXX/XXX/logs

comments_1.comment_text: Doesn't work. The reason can be that the followlinks option of os.walk is not set to True somewhere in the codes.

comments_2.comment_text: Thanks for your suggestions, we will fix it in next version.
